title: Smart Asia Chemical surges 25% on ACE Market debut after RM37.4m IPO
summary: Shares in Smart Asia Chemical Bhd (KL:SMART) surged 25% following the industrial paint and coating manufacturer's trading debut on Tuesday, after it raised RM37.4 million via its initial public offering (IPO).
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (May 28): Shares in Smart Asia Chemical Bhd (KL:SMART) surged 25% following the industrial paint and coating manufacturer's trading debut on Tuesday, after it raised RM37.4 million via its initial public offering (IPO).

Smart Asia Chemical opened at 50 sen on the ACE Market of Bursa Malaysia, versus its IPO price of 40 sen per share. The stock climbed to as high as 50.5 sen, and was last trading at 49 sen, after more than 23 million shares changed hands as at the time of writing.
